CustomField.description: If the guest is staying with an additional person and that person is a Contact, relate them here. If you set the Attendee lookup and that Attendee has a related Contact, this lookup will get auto-set.
CustomField.inlineHelpText: If the guest is staying with an additional person and that person is a Contact, relate them here. If you set the Attendee lookup and that Attendee has a related Contact, this lookup will get auto-set.
CustomField.label: Roommate (Contact)
